text: The award show will take place Nov. 5 in Los Angeles. Mary J. Blige, Timothee Chalamet and the cast of I, Tonya will be honored at the upcoming Hollywood Film Awards on Nov. 5 at the Beverly Hilton in Los Angeles. Blige is set to receive the Hollywood breakout performance actress award for her role in Mudbound, while Chalamet will be recognized for his performance in Call Me by Your Name with the Hollywood breakout performance actor award. Additionally, the cast of biopic I, Tonya, which focuses on disgraced figure skater Tonya Harding, including Margot Robbie ( who stars as the eponymous skater ), Allison Janney, Sebastian Stan, Paul Walter Hauser, Julianne Nicholson and Caitlin Carver will be honored with the Hollywood ensemble award
